channel.title: Stat problem
channel.description: My attack, defense, and strength keep dropping on my server when it is level 99. Can anyone tell mw how to fix it? Thanks.

item.title: Stat problem
item.dc:creator: @IcyPimp IcyPimp
item.description:
@IcyPimp wrote:

[quote=“xxdracxxx, post:2, topic:12790”]go in your mopar 30 folder… go to hybridscape and go to characters edit yours in the notepad save it and log out… then when you level it should go up in 1ns obviously but it shouldnt reduce again

Im needing help with putting items in shops… Also adding a page or 2 in smithing… I.E. as some servers have dragon smithing, guilded and barrows smithing… Someone help me out on that thanks[/quote]

Didn’t help at all, it was already like that. What I’m saying is, I’m 99 in the stat, but every 30 or so seconds it goes down by one.

Read full topic
